description: Try our easy to follow Star Lord Solar System recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Star Lord Solar System Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Shred potatoes and squeeze out as much moisture as possible. Place in a bowl.
Add flour, salmon, peas and parsley. Season, add egg and stir well to combine.

Heat half the oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Place 6 greased egg rings in pan and fill each with 3 tbs mixture. Cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Transfer to plate and keep warm. Repeat with oil and remaining potato mixture. (Makes 12 salmon cakes.)

To create the solar system, cut star shapes from 1/2 of the carrot and capsicum. Peel remaining carrot into ribbons for planets. Cut a moon shape from cheese and arrange on plates with extra peas and mayonnaise. Strips of carrot become planet rings on the salmon cakes.
